description: This table extracts the auth override user information associated with hospital billing temporary transactions.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUTH_OVERRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user that was responsible for the last authorization assignment.
